div.p: Identifies the degree of intention/authorization associated with the request
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/referralcategory defines the following codes:

tr.td: The referral request represents a suggestion or recommendation that a referral be made.
The referral request represents an intention by the author to make a referral, but no actual referral has yet been made/authorized.
This is an actual referral request which, when active, will have the authorizations needed to allow it to be actioned.
